name: Multi-Stick Cream Blush + Highlighter + Lip Tint
about: What it is: A buildable wash of color for cheeks and lips—now in a dewy and luminous finish to instantly wake up skin...Coverage: Light.Finish: Natural and Shimmer available.Formulation: Cream.Highlighted Ingredients: - Shea Butter: Nourishes skin and creates a creamy texture that melts on contact..- Avocado Oil: Softens and nourishes skin with antioxidants and fatty acids..- Orange Peel Wax: Protects and conditions skin with a breathable feel...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This creamy, multiuse formula melts with the warmth of skin for a fresh, foolproof veil of color anyone can wear. The twist-up stick makes it easy to apply on the go—just swipe and blend for skin that looks and feels alive.
ingredients: -Shea Butter: Nourishes skin and creates a creamy texture that melts on contact..-Avocado Oil: Softens and nourishes skin with antioxidants and fatty acids..-Orange Peel Wax: Protects and conditions skin with a breathable feel...Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Cera Alba/Beeswax/Cire d'abeille, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire de Candelilla, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Cera/Wax, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Mica, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Tocopherol. May Contain (+/-): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 45410 (Red 28), CI 19140 (Yellow 5)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to cheeks and lips straight from the tube..-Use your fingers or a brush to blend into cheeks..-Repeat for more color payoff..-Multi-Stick blends effortlessly over Super Serum Skin Tint SPF 40 (sold separately) or True Skin Serum Foundation (sold separately).
